pkgmetadata.longdescription: Compute Maximal Overlap Discrete Wavelet Transform (MODWT) and Trous Discrete Wavelet Transform // A lightweight package to compute Maximal Overlap Discrete Wavelet Transform (MODWT) and Trous Discrete Wavelet Transform by leveraging the power of 'Rcpp' to make these operations fast. This package was designed for use in forecasting, and allows users avoid the inclusion of future data when performing wavelet decomposition of time series. See Quilty and Adamowski (2018) doi:10.1016/j.jhydrol.2018.05.003.
